formElement.label: Java installation path:
formElement.documentation: Provide the path where java.exe is installed. Default value is java, which assumes it is loaded in the system path.

formElement.label: Selenium installation path:
formElement.documentation: Provide the path where Selenium is installed. If no value is provided 'selenium-server.jar' is used.

formElement.label: Browser:
formElement.documentation: Indicate the web browser to use.(This is the command-line '-htmlSuite ' option)

formElement.label: Start URL:
formElement.documentation: Provide the URL to apply the tests to.(This is the command-line '-htmlSuite ' option)

formElement.label: Suite file:
formElement.documentation: Provide the absolute path to the file that contains the suite tests.(This is the command-line '-htmlSuite ' option)

formElement.label: Result file:
formElement.documentation: Name the file where results will be saved. Do not indicate a path for the resultfile. To see the results clic in Selenium Test Results link on the Links section of the Job Details.(This is the command-line '-htmlSuite ' option)

formElement.label: Log file:
formElement.documentation: Provide a name for the log file. (This is the command-line '-log ' option)

formElement.label: Port:
formElement.documentation: Indicate the port to use, default is 4444. (This is the command-line '-port ' option)

formElement.label: Timeout:
formElement.documentation: Indicate the number of seconds before giving up on a process. (This is the command-line '-timeout' option)

formElement.label: Additional parameters:
formElement.documentation: Provide any additional commands for Selenium, written as if they were typed in the console.

formElement.label: Working directory:
formElement.documentation: Indicate the desired working directory. Leave blank to use the default workspace
